B.T.W. Don?t forget to secure your internet connection and filter out bad peers by using Peerguardian or a peer filter application.

Also filter out Anti-P2P company?s sending out corrupts data to the torrent hive to slow shit down. (plus governmental and educational institutions, advertising and reported malicious servers.)
